text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
-President Ben Ali receives Abderrahman Tlili, leader of the opposition Union Democratic Movement. Tlili expressed full support to President's policies.
-About 2,000 firms need to be modernised in the next five years.
-Foreign Affairs Minister Habib Ben Yahia started a visit to Iran where he handed President Rafsanjani a message from President Ben Ali.
- Morocco and Tunisia signed in Rabat a trade accord.
-Tunisia and Libya to cooperate in the health sector.
